p: During 2016â€“2017, two outbreaks of EPA occurred in Australian Defence Force (ADF) personnel during and after short military exercises in the Shoalwater Bay Training Area (SWBTA) in northeastern Australia. We conducted an investigation to confirm whether the 2 outbreaks of EPA among ADF personnel in SWBTA were attributable to RRV infection by identifying RRV RNA in patient serum samples and to determine whether the viruses were novel genotypes (and, if so, their phylogenetic origin).
